title: Saying Goodbye
description: These are polite phrases you can use to say goodbye to a customer or a coworker.

conversations.usage: Use to wish someone a good day.
conversation: I'm glad to hear it, have a great day!
conversations.title: Have a great day!

conversations.usage: Use to wish someone a good day.
conversation: Great. Enjoy the rest of your day!
conversations.title: Enjoy the rest of your day!

conversations.usage: Use to wish someone a good day.
conversation: We’ll have your order out in a minute.
No problem, have a good one!
conversations.title: Have a good one!

conversations.usage: Use to wish someone a good afternoon.
conversations.title: Have a good afternoon!

conversations.usage: Use after bringing food to a customer.
conversations.title: Enjoy your meal!

conversations.usage: Use when you will see someone the next day (like coworkers you will see again tomorrow).
conversation: Ok, I’ll be leaving soon too.
conversations.title: See you tomorrow!

conversations.usage: Use when you know you will see someone in the future (like your coworker of boss)
conversation: I’ll be back to work on Monday.
conversations.title: See you later!
